name: BugBlasters Alpha Demo
description:
This is a ALPHA Demo not the final product

Added fixed to pause menu and player start

Play with 4 of your friends in Bug Blasting action 

Goal:

Clear the Levels of all the Bugs and there Hives.  If you loose all your Health you loose your current score;

Xbox Controls :

Joystick - Movement

A Button - Jump

B Button - Shoot or Start player;

X Button - Throw Bomb;

Keyboard and Mouse Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse - Shoot or Start player;

Right Mouse - Throw Bomb

SpaceBar - Jump
